cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.7.0)

# add sources to the project
set (sources
     ${sources}
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/and.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/bitand.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/bool.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/compl.hpp
     ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/not.hpp
     PARENT_SCOPE)
